name: Kosen Labs
introduce: Kosen Labs aims to bring the benefits of advanced AI to the blockchain space to develop new, groundbreaking products. As the first step on this mission, Kosen Labs will be focusing on delivering the best-in-class solution for active liquidity provision (LP) on the next generation automated market makers (AMMs), such as Uniswap v3 and Sushiswap Trident.
